name: 7th Dragon 2020
description:
7th Dragon 2020 is a RPG game developed by Imageepoch. It came out on 23-11-2011. SEGA published the game. Most rawgers rated the game as "Skip".
You can play 7th Dragon 2020 on PSP.
It was produced by Rieko Kodama. It was directed by Kazuya Niinou. Yuzo Koshiro scored the game.
